document.full_text: britain's royal wedding is generating around 9,000 mentions a day online, or one every 10 seconds, according to a study from specialist technology firm greenlight published on thursday.
document.title: royal wedding mentioned every 10 seconds online: study
lines_and_colors: britain's royal wedding is generating around 9,000 mentions a day online, or one every 10 seconds, according to a study from specialist technology firm greenlight published on thursday.
